word_group.brief_definition: 庇护者；寻求庇护者；申请庇护者

bilingual.source: We'll start an asylum for old-time people.
bilingual.target: 我们要给老一代人准备一个避难所。

bilingual.source: You want to be alone in this insane asylum?
bilingual.target: 你想一个人呆在这令人发狂的避难所？

bilingual.source: We'll start an asylum for old-time people .
bilingual.target: 我们要给老一代人准备一个避难所。

bilingual.source: What Central Americans lack is a legal alternative to asylum. To be able to do so legally.
bilingual.target: 他们缺少的是一个边境避难所的合法替代方案。合法在美国工作的许可。

bilingual.source: I started my career decades ago at the southern US border, working with Central American asylum seekers.
bilingual.target: 十几年前我跟中美洲避难所合作，在美国南部边境开始了我的事业。

bilingual.source: The movie depicted the asylum as a terrifying madhouse.
bilingual.target: 电影将那个收容所描绘成一个可怕的疯人院。

bilingual.source: The political dissident sought asylum in a foreign country.
bilingual.target: 那位政治异见者在外国寻求庇护。

bilingual.source: Victims of persecution often seek asylum in other countries.
bilingual.target: 迫害的受害者经常在其他国家寻求庇护。

bilingual.source: Many refugees fled their war-torn homeland in search of asylum.
bilingual.target: 许多难民逃离战乱的家园，寻求庇护。

bilingual.source: The government has strict policies regarding the granting of asylum.
bilingual.target: 政府对授予庇护有严格的政策。

yingyinNormal.en: Your honor, blood feuds are a recognized ground for asylum.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法官阁下，世仇是经过认可的庇护条件。

yingyinNormal.en: A waitress? That is insane. That is so insane it should be in an ice tub in an asylum.
yingyinNormal.zh: 服务员？一派疯言，简直疯到应该扔进精神病院的冰浴缸里。

yingyinNormal.en: But it isn't relevant to asylum. Maybe not, but it is relevant to an application for a T visa.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但这和庇护无关。或许无关，但和申请T签证有关。

yingyinNormal.en: Seedy bar on the wrong side of the tracks, picnic near a lunatic asylum, a wine tasting on Skid Row.
yingyinNormal.zh: 去贫民区破旧的酒吧，去疯人院附近野餐，去贫民窟品酒。

yingyinNormal.en: The demons beneath the road? This is where we trap them. Sherrinford is more than a prison, or an asylum.
yingyinNormal.zh: 脚下的恶魔？我们就把他们困在那里。夏瑞福德不止是座监狱或精神病院，而是座堡垒。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, what you need to do is figure out a way to exact vengeance on Kripke, like, how the Joker got back at Batman for putting him in the Arkham Asylum for the Criminally Insane.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，你现在得好好想想到底怎么报复克瑞普克，好比蝙蝠侠把疯子罪犯小丑扔进了亚克汗疯人院，事后他不是越狱了吗？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an institution offering shelter and support to people who are mentally ill
protection that a government gives to people who have left their own country, usually because they were in danger for political reasons
